House 4 – 7 perches (2584 square feet) – Rs.21.5 million

The stunning architecture of these beautiful 4-bedroom houses are built out of the concepts of modern living and lifestyle, complete with spacious living areas, ample parking and luxury fixtures. The good ventilation creates a comforting and welcoming atmosphere throughout the homes, while having a well-lit interior during the day because of wide glass windows. The two story houses are built between 8 – 7 perches of land with many exclusive brands of fixtures and fittings presenting a more luxurious surrounding. The neighborhood is highly residential meaning there’s additional security, but is also very quiet. The rooftop terraces and gardens are a great way to host social gatherings, especially with the inviting ambience.

The locations of the houses are connected to Malabe, Hokandara, Kaduwela, Thalawathugoda, Welivita and Boralugoda with a series of convenient shortcuts to avoid traffic, it is also located close the Southern Expressway. Malabe is known for being an area that has abundant wildlife with a peaceful and relaxing environment, it’s a great opportunity for those trying to get away from the busy lifestyle of Colombo.
